text: Tarisai! Ndimi avo vari kudaidzwa kuti mushandise (hupfumi) hwenyu munzira yaAllah, asi mukati menyu mune vamwe vakaomera. Uye uyo akaomera, zvirokwazvo akaomera iye pachake. Asi Allah mupfumi, uye imi muri varombo. Uye kana mukafuratira (Islaam nekuteerera Allah), vachakutsivai nevamwe vanhu vasiri imi, uye havazoiti semi
